leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-功能/位点/相互作用预测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 表征→功能/位点→相互作用→解释→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模型库 + 数据集 + 评测

queries: [WEB] graph neural network protein structure github

tools.name: ADesigner
tools.one_line_profile: One-shot antibody designer using Cross-Gate MLP with Protein Complex Invariant Embedding
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of the AAAI'24 paper. A deep learning model designed for the specific task of antibody design, utilizing invariant embeddings to generate antibody sequences/structures.

tools.name: AGAT-PPIS
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-protein interaction site predictor based on deep graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool utilizing Attention Graph Neural Networks to predict protein-protein interaction sites from sequence and structure information.

tools.name: CodonTransformer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based tool for codon optimization in protein expression
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for optimizing DNA codon usage to maximize protein expression, trained on a large dataset of diverse organisms.

tools.name: protein-ligand-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based model for protein-ligand interaction prediction with XAI
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network implementation for predicting protein-ligand binding affinities, incorporating Explainable AI (XAI) features to interpret interactions.

tools.name: PRO-LDM
tools.one_line_profile: Conditional Latent Diffusion Model for protein sequence design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model based on latent diffusion for designing protein sequences with optimized functions, conditioned on specific properties.

tools.name: HNetGO
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction via heterogeneous network transformer
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method leveraging heterogeneous network transformers to predict Gene Ontology (GO) terms for proteins.

tools.name: TMbed
tools.one_line_profile: Transmembrane protein prediction using Language Model embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting transmembrane beta-barrels and alpha-helices using embeddings from protein language models (ProtT5).

tools.name: EquiPNAS
tools.one_line_profile: E(3) equivariant GNN for protein-nucleic acid binding site prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning model that uses protein language model embeddings and E(3) equivariant networks to predict binding sites for RNA/DNA on proteins.

tools.name: ProRNA3D-single
tools.one_line_profile: Single-sequence protein-RNA complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method for predicting the 3D structure of protein-RNA complexes using biological language models, operating on single sequences.

tools.name: APPT
tools.one_line_profile: Affinity Protein-Protein Transformers for binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model designed to rapidly predict protein-protein binding affinity with high accuracy.

tools.name: ATOMRefine
tools.one_line_profile: 3D equivariant graph transformer for all-atom protein structure refinement
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for refining protein tertiary structures using SE(3) equivariant graph transformers.

tools.name: CDPred
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer for predicting interchain residue distances in protein complexes
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for predicting distance maps between residues in protein complexes, aiding in complex structure reconstruction.

tools.name: DeepInteract
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning framework for protein interface contact prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric transformer-based framework for predicting interfacial contacts in protein complexes.

tools.name: DeepRefine
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning method for protein complex structure refinement
tools.detailed_description: A tool for refining and assessing the quality of protein complex structures using geometric deep learning.

tools.name: rag-esm
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval-augmented framework for ESM2 protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A framework that enhances ESM2 protein language models by conditioning them on retrieved homologous sequences (RAG).

tools.name: CELL-E_2
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal transformer for image-based protein predictions
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal encoder-only transformer model designed to perform protein predictions based on cellular images.

tools.name: Protein-Localization-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Text-to-Image synthesis for protein localization prediction (CELL-E)
tools.detailed_description: A tool for zero-shot text-to-image synthesis to predict protein localization, bridging biological text and cellular images.

tools.name: PST
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Structure Transformer for structural knowledge injection
tools.detailed_description: A framework (Protein Structure Transformer) that endows pretrained protein language models with structural knowledge for improved representation.

tools.name: SMICLR
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning on multiple molecular representations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for molecular representation learning using contrastive learning on both graph and SMILES representations.

tools.name: QATEN
tools.one_line_profile: Protein model quality assessment using attention GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for assessing the quality of protein structure models using attention-based graph neural networks.

tools.name: GraphscoreDTA
tools.one_line_profile: GNN strategy for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network model incorporating Vina distance optimization terms to predict drug-target binding affinity.

tools.name: CarbonNovo
tools.one_line_profile: Joint design of protein structure and sequence using energy-based models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for de novo protein design that jointly optimizes structure and sequence using a unified energy-based model.

tools.name: MULAN
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Protein Language Model for Sequence and Structure Encoding
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal language model that encodes both protein sequence and structure information for downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: SETH
tools.one_line_profile: Residue-wise disorder prediction using ProtT5 embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting intrinsic disorder in proteins at the residue level using embeddings from the ProtT5 transformer.

tools.name: bio-datasets
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of biological datasets and embeddings access library
tools.detailed_description: A library providing easy access to a collection of biological datasets and pre-computed embeddings for machine learning in biology.

tools.name: bio-transformers
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for ESM/ProtBERT models to generate protein embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly wrapper library for state-of-the-art protein language models (ESM, ProtBERT) to facilitate embedding generation and downstream tasks.

tools.name: ESM-GearNet
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Structure Representation Learning combining ESM and GearNet
tools.detailed_description: A model framework that integrates Evolutionary Scale Modeling (ESM) with GearNet for enhanced protein structure representation learning.

tools.name: GearNet
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Pretraining Methods for Protein Structure Representation Learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for geometric pretraining on protein structures, implementing the GearNet architecture for representation learning.

tools.name: S3F
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-Structure-Surface Model for Protein Fitness Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model integrating sequence, structure, and surface features to predict protein fitness and mutational effects.

tools.name: SiamDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Siamese Sequence-Structure Diffusion for Protein Encoder Pre-training
tools.detailed_description: A pre-training framework for protein encoders using a Siamese diffusion trajectory prediction task to learn sequence-structure correlations.

tools.name: esm-s
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-Informed Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that incorporates structural information to improve sequence representation and downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: DeepRank-GNN-esm
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Network for protein-protein interface with language model features
tools.detailed_description: An extension of DeepRank-GNN that incorporates features from protein language models (ESM) to improve protein-protein interface prediction.

tools.name: DeepRank-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Network for protein-protein interface analysis
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network framework for analyzing and scoring protein-protein interfaces, converting structural data into graph representations.

tools.name: InstructPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Instruction-tuned protein language model for structure-guided tasks
tools.detailed_description: A large protein language model trained to follow structure instructions, enabling better alignment between sequence and structural modalities for protein design and analysis.

tools.name: InterPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretability tool for Protein Language Models using Sparse Autoencoders
tools.detailed_description: A framework for discovering interpretable features in Protein Language Models (PLMs) via Sparse Autoencoders, helping to understand the internal representations of biological sequences.

tools.name: KCL
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular contrastive learning with chemical element knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for molecular representation learning that integrates chemical element knowledge graphs into contrastive learning to enhance molecular property prediction.

tools.name: Frame-Averaging-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Frame Averaging Transformer for protein-nucleic acid complex modeling
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning model utilizing frame averaging transformers to model protein-nucleic acid complexes, improving prediction accuracy for these interactions.

tools.name: GeoDock
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible protein-protein docking with multi-track iterative transformer
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method for flexible protein-protein docking that uses a multi-track iterative transformer to predict the 3D structure of protein complexes.

tools.name: GS-Meta
tools.one_line_profile: Graph sampling-based meta-learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A meta-learning framework designed for molecular property prediction that utilizes graph sampling techniques to handle few-shot learning scenarios in chemistry.

tools.name: KANO
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph-enhanced molecular contrastive learning with functional prompts
tools.detailed_description: A molecular representation learning framework that leverages knowledge graphs and functional prompts to improve contrastive learning for downstream molecular tasks.

tools.name: OpenProtein
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source platform for protein pre-training models and tasks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform for training and evaluating protein language models, supporting multiple architectures and downstream tasks in protein science.

tools.name: PromptProtein
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-level protein structure pre-training with prompt learning
tools.detailed_description: A pre-training framework for protein structure analysis that incorporates prompt learning to adapt pre-trained models to various downstream structural tasks.

tools.name: ProtHGT
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Graph Transformer for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model utilizing Heterogeneous Graph Transformers (HGT) to predict protein functions by integrating biological knowledge graphs and protein language model embeddings.

tools.name: TamGent
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based generative solution for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model designed to tailor molecules for specific protein pockets using Transformer architectures, facilitating structure-based drug design.

tools.name: EquiBind
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein-ligand binding structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning model that predicts the 3D structure of protein-ligand complexes, offering fast and accurate binding pose estimation.

tools.name: protein-localization
tools.one_line_profile: Protein subcellular localization prediction using Transformer embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing Transformer-based protein embeddings and linear attention mechanisms to predict the subcellular localization of proteins.

tools.name: proximal-exploration
tools.one_line_profile: Proximal exploration for model-guided protein sequence design
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of proximal exploration algorithms for optimizing protein sequence design guided by predictive models.

tools.name: MolSets
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular graph deep sets learning for mixture property modeling
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework using Deep Sets on molecular graphs to model the properties of chemical mixtures.

tools.name: Ligand_Generation
tools.one_line_profile: Target-aware VAE for ligand generation with multimodal protein representation
tools.detailed_description: A Variational Auto-Encoder (VAE) based model for generating ligands tailored to specific protein targets, utilizing multimodal protein representations.

tools.name: Protein_Pretrain
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal pretraining for unsupervised protein representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework for unsupervised protein representation learning that leverages multimodal data to create robust protein embeddings.

tools.name: TopEC
tools.one_line_profile: Protein function prediction using structures and deep GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein functions (EC numbers) by analyzing protein structures with deep graph neural networks.

tools.name: ProtFlash
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight protein language model
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and efficient protein language model designed for fast inference and low-resource settings while maintaining performance on downstream tasks.

tools.name: FLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for protein sequence representations in protein design
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tasks and datasets designed to probe and benchmark the effectiveness of protein sequence representations for modeling various aspects of protein design.

tools.name: Cryo-MEM
tools.one_line_profile: Membrane signal subtraction for cryo-EM reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Software for subtracting membrane signals in cryo-EM data to facilitate high-resolution reconstruction of membrane proteins embedded in their native environment.

tools.name: LMNglyPred
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of human N-linked glycosylation sites using PLM embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting N-linked glycosylation sites in human proteins by utilizing embeddings from pre-trained protein language models.

tools.name: LMPhosSite
tools.one_line_profile: Protein phosphorylation site prediction using PLM embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach for predicting general protein phosphorylation sites, integrating local sequence windows with embeddings from pre-trained protein language models.

tools.name: pLMSNOSite
tools.one_line_profile: Protein S-nitrosylation site prediction using ensemble embeddings
tools.detailed_description: An ensemble-based tool for predicting protein S-nitrosylation sites by integrating supervised word embeddings and protein language model embeddings.

tools.name: ReLSO
tools.one_line_profile: Regularized Latent Space Optimization for generative protein design
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based neural network framework (ReLSO) for generating highly optimized protein sequences via regularized latent space optimization.

tools.name: ThermoMPNN
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for predicting thermodynamic stability changes in protein mutants
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model trained to predict changes in thermodynamic stability (Delta Delta G) for protein point mutations.

tools.name: PeSTo
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein binding interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning method that predicts protein binding interfaces directly from protein structures without relying on MSAs.

tools.name: PeSTo-Carbs
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein-carbohydrate binding interface prediction
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the PeSTo framework specifically designed to predict binding interfaces between proteins and carbohydrates.

tools.name: XAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-engine framework for antimicrobial peptide discovery
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining ESM-2 and Transformers to discover antimicrobial peptides, specifically applied to deciphering the deep-sea antimicrobial peptidome.

tools.name: MAPE-PPI
tools.one_line_profile: Microenvironment-aware protein embedding for PPI prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method for effective and efficient protein-protein interaction prediction that utilizes microenvironment-aware protein embeddings.

tools.name: LucaPCycle
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-channel model for phosphate-solubilizing protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model based on raw sequence and protein language models to predict phosphate-solubilizing functionality and classify specific types among fine-grained functions.

tools.name: LucaVirus
tools.one_line_profile: Unified genome-protein language model for viral evolutionary and functional modeling
tools.detailed_description: LucaVirus is a deep learning framework that utilizes a unified genome-protein language model to capture the evolutionary and functional landscape of viruses, enabling tasks such as taxonomy classification and host prediction.

tools.name: HalluDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Hallucination-driven framework for protein sequence and structure co-design
tools.detailed_description: HalluDesign is an all-atom framework that leverages the forward pass of structure prediction models for the iterative co-optimization and co-design of protein sequences and structures.

tools.name: CodonFM
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-resolution language models for protein-coding sequences
tools.detailed_description: CodonFM provides a family of language models trained on codon-resolution protein-coding sequences, enabling analysis that bridges genomic and proteomic data.

tools.name: cuik-molmaker
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance molecular featurization package for GNNs
tools.detailed_description: cuik-molmaker is a specialized package for converting chemical structures into formats optimized for deep learning models, particularly graph neural networks, facilitating molecular modeling tasks.

tools.name: la-proteina
tools.one_line_profile: Latent flow matching model for joint protein sequence and structure generation
tools.detailed_description: La-Proteina is a generative model that uses partially latent flow matching to jointly generate protein amino acid sequences and full atomistic structures, including backbones and side chains.

tools.name: Proteina
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale flow-based protein backbone generator
tools.detailed_description: Proteina is a scalable transformer-based model for generating protein backbones, utilizing hierarchical fold class labels for conditional generation.

tools.name: CGIB
tools.one_line_profile: Conditional Graph Information Bottleneck for molecular relational learning
tools.detailed_description: CGIB implements the Conditional Graph Information Bottleneck framework to improve molecular relational learning by extracting robust and discriminative subgraph structures.

tools.name: NodeCoder
tools.one_line_profile: GCN-based framework for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: NodeCoder is a general framework utilizing graph convolutional neural networks to predict protein functions by modeling protein structures and interactions as graphs.

tools.name: ProteinNPT
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Parametric Transformers for protein property prediction and design
tools.detailed_description: ProteinNPT improves protein property prediction and design by combining non-parametric retrieval mechanisms with transformer architectures to leverage labeled data effectively.

tools.name: Tranception
tools.one_line_profile: Autoregressive transformer for protein fitness prediction
tools.detailed_description: Tranception is a model for predicting protein fitness using autoregressive transformers and inference-time retrieval, capable of scoring the likelihood of amino acid sequences.

tools.name: PoET
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model of protein families as sequences-of-sequences
tools.detailed_description: PoET is a generative model designed to learn the distribution of protein families by treating them as sequences of sequences, enabling generation and analysis of homologous proteins.

tools.name: PoET-2
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval-augmented protein language model for generation and representation
tools.detailed_description: PoET-2 is the successor to PoET, featuring a retrieval-augmented multimodel architecture for enhanced protein sequence generation and representation learning.

tools.name: AlphaFill
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm to transplant missing compounds to AlphaFold models
tools.detailed_description: AlphaFill enriches AlphaFold protein models by transplanting missing small molecules and ions from experimentally determined homologous structures based on sequence and structure similarity.

tools.name: ProLLaMA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Large Language Model for multi-task processing
tools.detailed_description: ProLLaMA is a protein large language model adapted from LLaMA, fine-tuned for multi-task protein language processing, including generation and property prediction.

tools.name: TaxDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic-guided diffusion model for protein sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: TaxDiff is a diffusion model that utilizes taxonomic information to guide the generation of protein sequences, allowing for controlled generation across different species or clades.

tools.name: PaccMann Proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language modeling tools from the PaccMann framework
tools.detailed_description: PaccMann Proteomics provides models and tools for protein language modeling, part of the broader PaccMann framework for drug discovery and systems pharmacology.

tools.name: proseLM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned protein language model for design
tools.detailed_description: proseLM adapts protein language models to be conditioned on structural information, facilitating inverse folding and structure-based protein design tasks.

tools.name: ProtLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Interleaved protein-language LLM with protein-as-word pre-training
tools.detailed_description: ProtLLM is a large language model that interleaves protein sequences and natural language, utilizing a 'protein-as-word' pre-training strategy to understand and generate protein data in context.

tools.name: PSALM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Sequence Annotation with Language Models
tools.detailed_description: PSALM leverages protein language models to perform hierarchical annotation of protein sequences, predicting functions and properties directly from sequence data.

tools.name: caliby
tools.one_line_profile: Potts model-based protein sequence design tool
tools.detailed_description: Caliby implements Potts models for protein sequence design, allowing for the statistical modeling of co-evolutionary patterns to guide the generation of functional sequences.

tools.name: KeAP
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced primary structure reasoning for protein representation
tools.detailed_description: KeAP enhances protein representation learning by integrating knowledge graphs and primary structure reasoning, improving performance on downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: EAT
tools.one_line_profile: Embedding-based annotation transfer for proteins
tools.detailed_description: EAT (Embedding-based Annotation Transfer) uses Euclidean distances between protein embeddings to transfer functional annotations from labeled proteins to query proteins.

tools.name: VESPA
tools.one_line_profile: Single Amino Acid Variant effect predictor using ProtT5 embeddings
tools.detailed_description: VESPA predicts the effects of Single Amino Acid Variants (SAVs) by leveraging embeddings from the ProtT5 protein language model, offering a lightweight yet effective prediction tool.

tools.name: TALE
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein function annotation with joint embedding
tools.detailed_description: TALE uses a transformer architecture to jointly embed protein features and functional labels, facilitating accurate protein function annotation.

tools.name: SeqDance
tools.one_line_profile: Biophysics-informed protein language models
tools.detailed_description: SeqDance (and ESMDance) integrates biophysical constraints and knowledge into protein language models to improve their predictive capabilities and physical realism.

tools.name: GCNdesign
tools.one_line_profile: GCN-based model for structure-based protein sequence design
tools.detailed_description: GCNdesign utilizes Graph Convolutional Networks to predict amino acid sequences from protein backbone structures, serving as a tool for inverse folding and protein design.

tools.name: iLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for feature analysis of DNA, RNA, and protein sequences
tools.detailed_description: iLearn is a toolkit and web server for feature calculation, extraction, clustering, selection, and model construction for biological sequences (DNA, RNA, Protein), supporting a wide range of descriptors.

tools.name: ProteinLM
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Language Model implementation by THUDM
tools.detailed_description: ProteinLM provides implementations of protein language models for learning representations of protein sequences, facilitating downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: Geometricus
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based, alignment-free protein embedding tool
tools.detailed_description: Geometricus generates fixed-length embeddings for protein structures using a shape-mer approach (moment invariants), enabling alignment-free comparison and machine learning applications.

tools.name: SGGRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal representation learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: SGGRL implements a multi-modal framework combining sequence, graph, and geometry information for accurate molecular property prediction.

tools.name: CarsiDock
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning paradigm for protein-ligand docking and screening
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for accurate protein-ligand docking and screening that utilizes large-scale pre-training to improve prediction accuracy.

tools.name: sparcleqc
tools.one_line_profile: Automated input file creation for quantum chemical studies of embedded proteins
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to automate the creation of input files for quantum chemical studies involving embedded proteins, streamlining the setup process for computational chemistry simulations.

tools.name: RNAGEN
tools.one_line_profile: GAN-based model for generating synthetic RNA sequences targeting proteins
tools.detailed_description: A generative adversarial network (GAN) model designed to generate synthetic RNA sequences that target specific proteins, facilitating the study of RNA-protein interactions.

tools.name: RNAtranslator
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-conditional RNA design via sequence-to-sequence translation
tools.detailed_description: A tool that models protein-conditional RNA design as a sequence-to-sequence natural language translation task, enabling the generation of RNA sequences based on protein targets.

tools.name: bcpaff
tools.one_line_profile: Electron density-based geometric deep learning for binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool exploring protein-ligand binding affinity prediction using electron density-based geometric deep learning techniques.

tools.name: Frame2seq
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned masked language modeling for protein sequence design
tools.detailed_description: A structure-conditioned masked language model for protein sequence design, enabling inverse folding tasks by predicting sequences from backbone structures.

tools.name: Multi-Fidelity GNNs
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer learning with GNNs for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of transfer learning with graph neural networks for improved molecular property prediction in multi-fidelity settings, combining data from different sources/accuracies.

tools.name: DeepNano
tools.one_line_profile: Nanobody-antigen interaction prediction with ensemble deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting nanobody-antigen interactions using ensemble deep learning and prompt-based protein language models.

tools.name: MT-DTI
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule Transformer for Drug Target Interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of the Molecule Transformer Drug Target Interaction (MT-DTI) model, utilizing self-attention mechanisms to predict interactions between drugs and protein targets.

tools.name: SPACE
tools.one_line_profile: STRING proteins as complementary embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A method for generating protein embeddings using STRING interaction network data, serving as complementary representations for protein analysis tasks.

tools.name: DepoScope
tools.one_line_profile: Fine-tuned ESM-2 model for phage depolymerase detection
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing a fine-tuned ESM-2 protein language model to accurately detect and classify phage depolymerases within genomic sequences.

tools.name: S-PLM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware Protein Language Model via Contrastive Learning
tools.detailed_description: A structure-aware protein language model that uses contrastive learning to align sequence and structure representations for improved protein analysis.

tools.name: HyPepTox-Fuse
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid framework for peptide toxicity prediction
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable hybrid framework for accurate peptide toxicity prediction that fuses protein language model-based embeddings with conventional physicochemical descriptors.

tools.name: Revisiting-PLMs
tools.one_line_profile: Evolution-aware protein language models for function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A study and toolkit exploring evolution-aware and alignment-free protein language models as predictors for protein function.

tools.name: BridgeDPI
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for Predicting Drug-Protein Interactions
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network-based tool for predicting interactions between drugs and proteins, facilitating drug discovery and repurposing.

tools.name: protein-interaction-network
tools.one_line_profile: Computes molecular graphs for protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A library to compute molecular interaction graphs from protein structures, useful for graph-based learning on proteins.

tools.name: ESM
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary Scale Modeling: Pretrained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A collection of state-of-the-art pretrained protein language models (ESM-1b, ESM-2, ESMFold) for predicting protein structure, function, and other properties from sequence data.

tools.name: Graph_convolutional_NN_molecule_maker
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A geometric machine learning tool using Graph Neural Networks for generating molecular structures.

tools.name: neural_fingerprints_tf
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of Convolutional Networks on Graphs for Fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of convolutional networks on graphs for learning molecular fingerprints, enabling property prediction and molecular analysis.

tools.name: METL
tools.one_line_profile: Mutational Effect Transfer Learning framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for pretraining and finetuning biophysics-informed protein language models to predict mutational effects.

tools.name: Data-Efficient Grammar
tools.one_line_profile: Data-Efficient Graph Grammar Learning for Molecular Generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for molecular generation using data-efficient graph grammar learning, capable of generating valid molecules with limited training data.

tools.name: T-ALPHA
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical transformer for protein-ligand binding affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A hierarchical transformer-based deep neural network for predicting protein-ligand binding affinity, featuring uncertainty-aware self-learning for protein-specific alignment.

tools.name: S3V2_IDEAS_ESMP
tools.one_line_profile: S3norm ver2 and IDEAS pipeline for epigenetic state analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline incorporating S3norm version 2 and IDEAS for analyzing epigenetic states and generating master peak lists from ChIP-seq data.

tools.name: DeepRank-GNN-ESM
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Network for protein-protein interface with language model features
tools.detailed_description: An extension of DeepRank-GNN that incorporates protein language model (ESM) features for improved prediction of protein-protein interfaces.

tools.name: CoPRA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-RNA binding affinity prediction using cross-domain pretrained models
tools.detailed_description: A model bridging cross-domain pretrained sequence models with complex structures for accurate protein-RNA binding affinity prediction.

tools.name: MolGraphEval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluating Self-supervised Learning for Molecular Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A framework for evaluating and benchmarking self-supervised learning methods for generating molecular graph embeddings.

tools.name: PSICHIC
tools.one_line_profile: Physicochemical GNN for protein-ligand interaction fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A physicochemical graph neural network (PSICHIC) for learning protein-ligand interaction fingerprints directly from sequence data, enabling interpretable interaction prediction.

tools.name: ProGen2-finetuning
tools.one_line_profile: Finetuning ProGen2 for protein sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for finetuning the ProGen2 protein language model to generate protein sequences from specific families or with desired properties.

tools.name: cu-tsp
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Structure Prediction by Embeddings and Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method for accurate protein structure prediction utilizing embeddings and deep learning representations.

tools.name: TemStaPro
tools.one_line_profile: Protein thermostability prediction using PLM representations
tools.detailed_description: A program for predicting protein thermostability using sequence representations derived from protein language models.

tools.name: MoCL-DK
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive Learning on Molecular Graph with Domain Knowledge
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MoCL, a contrastive learning framework for molecular graphs that incorporates multi-level domain knowledge for improved representation learning.

tools.name: Protein Sequence BFN
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Sequence Modelling with Bayesian Flow Networks
tools.detailed_description: Code for modelling protein sequences using Bayesian Flow Networks (BFN), offering a generative approach for protein sequence data.

tools.name: pKa-ANI
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate prediction of protein pKa with representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the accurate prediction of protein pKa values utilizing representation learning techniques, aiding in the understanding of protein electrostatics and function.

tools.name: pnabind
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for protein-nucleic acid binding prediction using GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A python package and collection of scripts for computing protein surface meshes, chemical, electrostatic, geometric features, and building/training graph neural network models of protein-nucleic acid binding.

tools.name: CryoTransformer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer model for cryo-EM particle picking
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model designed for the automated picking of protein particles in cryo-EM images, facilitating structural biology workflows.

tools.name: TransFun
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein function prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool utilizing Transformer architectures to predict protein functions from sequences.

tools.name: DeepProtein
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library and benchmark for protein sequence learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library and benchmark suite for applying deep learning techniques to protein sequence analysis tasks.

tools.name: MBP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task Bioassay Pre-training for affinity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging multi-task bioassay pre-training to improve protein-ligand binding affinity predictions.

tools.name: quarto-molstar
tools.one_line_profile: Mol* visualization embedding for Quarto documents
tools.detailed_description: A tool to embed interactive protein structures and trajectories using Mol* within Quarto scientific publications and reports.

tools.name: genesis
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative models for biological sequences
tools.detailed_description: A library of diverse deep generative models (Deep Exploration Networks) designed for DNA, RNA, and protein sequence generation and exploration.

tools.name: seqprop
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence optimization via Stochastic Sequence Propagation
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based model for optimizing DNA, RNA, and protein sequences based on predictor feedback using Stochastic Sequence Propagation.

tools.name: protein-transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure prediction via sequence modeling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein structures directly from sequence data using transformer-based modeling techniques.

tools.name: GNN_DOVE
tools.one_line_profile: Protein docking model evaluation using GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based tool for evaluating the quality of protein docking models (DOcking decoy EValuation).

tools.name: pLM-BLAST
tools.one_line_profile: Remote homology detection using protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting remote protein homology by comparing representations generated by protein language models, serving as a modern alternative to sequence alignment.

tools.name: TorchProteinLibrary
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for protein representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library providing specialized layers and utilities for processing and learning from protein structural and sequence representations.

tools.name: transformerCPI
tools.one_line_profile: Compound-protein interaction prediction with self-attention
tools.detailed_description: A sequence-based deep learning tool using self-attention mechanisms to predict compound-protein interactions (CPI).

tools.name: transformerCPI2.0
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-to-drug framework for interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: An updated framework for compound-protein interaction prediction that emphasizes a sequence-to-drug concept, suitable for targets without high-quality 3D structures.

tools.name: PLM-interact
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-protein interaction prediction using PLMs
tools.detailed_description: A tool that extends protein language models (PLMs) to predict protein-protein interactions (PPI) based on sequence embeddings.

tools.name: chroma-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Chroma protein generative model
tools.detailed_description: An open-source PyTorch implementation of Chroma, a generative model for proteins using Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM) and Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: ddpm-ipa-protein-generation
tools.one_line_profile: Protein generation with DDPM and Invariant Point Attention
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a protein structure and sequence generation model combining Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM) with Invariant Point Attention (IPA).

tools.name: equiformer-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Equiformer-based diffusion model for protein design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a denoising diffusion model for protein design utilizing Equiformer architecture for improved SE(3) equivariance.

tools.name: progen
tools.one_line_profile: Jax implementation of ProGen protein language model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation and replication of ProGen, a language model for protein generation, written in Jax.

tools.name: protein-bert-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of ProteinBERT
tools.detailed_description: An open-source PyTorch implementation of the ProteinBERT model for protein sequence representation learning.

tools.name: esmdiff
tools.one_line_profile: Structure Language Models for Protein Conformation Generation
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for generating protein conformations using Structure Language Models, as presented in ICLR'25.

tools.name: ConFit
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive fitness learning for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A tool for reprogramming protein language models via contrastive fitness learning to predict protein fitness landscapes with low-N data.

tools.name: DeepLocalProteinDocking
tools.one_line_profile: Protein representation learning for rigid-body docking
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for learning protein representations specifically optimized for rigid-body protein docking tasks.

tools.name: GNN_PPI
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for inter-novel-protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model designed to predict interactions between novel proteins by learning from correlations.

tools.name: Bacformer
tools.one_line_profile: Whole bacterial genome modeling as protein sequences
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model that treats whole bacterial genomes as sequences of proteins for genomic modeling and analysis.

tools.name: GCP-VQVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete language for protein 3D structure
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of GCP-VQVAE, a model providing a geometry-complete representation language for protein 3D structures using Vector Quantized Variational Autoencoders.

tools.name: ProteinGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Protein model quality assessment using GCNs
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) based tool for assessing the quality of protein structure models.

tools.name: CPI_prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Compound-protein interaction prediction using GNN and CNN
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model combining Graph Neural Networks (GNN) for compounds and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) for proteins to predict compound-protein interactions (CPI).

tools.name: molecularGNN_smiles
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) implementation for learning molecular representations based on r-radius subgraphs (fingerprints) directly from SMILES.

tools.name: ProstT5
tools.one_line_profile: Bilingual Language Model for Protein Sequence and Structure
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model capable of translating between protein sequence and structure (3Di) representations, enabling structure-aware sequence analysis.

tools.name: SeqVec
tools.one_line_profile: Embeddings for protein sequences using ELMo
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating continuous vector representations (embeddings) for protein sequences using deep bi-directional language models (ELMo), capturing biophysical properties.

tools.name: FS-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Learning Dataset and Benchmark for Molecules
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and evaluation benchmark designed to drive few-shot learning research in molecular property prediction and graph-structured data.

tools.name: Graphormer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based deep learning backbone for molecular modeling
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose graph transformer model for molecular modeling tasks, achieving state-of-the-art performance on various graph representation learning benchmarks.

tools.name: EvoDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Discrete diffusion models for protein sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for generating protein sequences and evolutionary alignments using discrete diffusion models, enabling controllable protein design.

tools.name: FoldingDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion model for protein structure generation
tools.detailed_description: A generative model using diffusion processes on protein backbone angles to generate diverse and designable protein structures.

tools.name: PEFT Proteomics
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (LoRA) for Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) and other PEFT methods specifically adapted for fine-tuning large protein language models on downstream tasks.

tools.name: USPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Signal peptide predictor using deep protein language models
tools.detailed_description: An unbiased, organism-agnostic, and highly sensitive signal peptide predictor that leverages deep protein language model embeddings.

tools.name: Litmatter
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for deep learning on molecular and crystal graphs
tools.detailed_description: A library for rapid experimentation and scaling of deep learning models specifically designed for molecular and crystal graph structures.

tools.name: EquiDock
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for rigid protein-protein docking
tools.detailed_description: A rigid protein-protein docking method that uses SE(3)-equivariant graph neural networks to predict docking poses directly and rapidly.

tools.name: SpatialPPIv2
tools.one_line_profile: PPI prediction using GNNs and protein language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein-protein interactions by combining spatial information processed by GNNs with sequence features from protein language models.

tools.name: RL-GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based molecular generation using RL and GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A platform for targeted molecular generation that uses Gated Graph Neural Networks fine-tuned with reinforcement learning to generate molecules with desired properties.

tools.name: ProteinSolver
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for protein sequence design (inverse folding)
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network model designed to generate amino acid sequences that fold into a given protein topology (inverse folding problem).

tools.name: CaLM
tools.one_line_profile: Codon-aware Language Model for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model trained on coding DNA sequences (codons) rather than amino acids, enabling the capture of synonymous codon usage information.

tools.name: esm2quinox
tools.one_line_profile: ESM2 implementation in Equinox/JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX/Equinox implementation of the ESM2 protein language model, enabling efficient training and inference within the JAX ecosystem.

tools.name: Path-Planning (P2)
tools.one_line_profile: Masked diffusion model sampling for sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing the P2 (Path Planning) method, a masked diffusion model sampling strategy for generating protein or text sequences.

tools.name: FAPLM
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient PyTorch implementation of Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A drop-in, highly efficient PyTorch implementation of various protein language models, optimized for speed and memory usage.

tools.name: protein-sequence-diffusion-model
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion model for protein sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model specifically designed for generating novel protein sequences.

tools.name: LASErMPNN
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand-conditioned protein sequence design model
tools.detailed_description: An all-atom, ligand-conditioned protein sequence design and sidechain packing model, extending ProteinMPNN to handle ligands including hydrogens.

tools.name: Merizo Search
tools.one_line_profile: Fast protein domain structure embedding and search
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating protein domain structure embeddings and performing fast similarity searches, useful for identifying structural homologs.

tools.name: GenSLMs
tools.one_line_profile: Genome-scale language models for SARS-CoV-2 evolution
tools.detailed_description: Genome-scale language models designed to analyze and predict evolutionary dynamics of SARS-CoV-2, capable of identifying variants of concern.

tools.name: FAMPNN
tools.one_line_profile: Full-atom protein sequence design with sidechain conditioning
tools.detailed_description: A protein design model that incorporates sidechain context and modeling for full-atom sequence design, improving upon backbone-only methods.

tools.name: AbMap
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language model customized for antibodies
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model specifically trained and customized for antibody sequences to predict antibody properties and structure.

tools.name: HIMP-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Inter-Message Passing for Molecular Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network architecture utilizing hierarchical inter-message passing to learn representations of molecular graphs for property prediction.

tools.name: bio_embeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for generating protein embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline and library for generating, visualizing, and using protein embeddings from various state-of-the-art protein language models.

tools.name: ProVis
tools.one_line_profile: Interpreting attention in Protein Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing and interpreting the attention mechanisms within protein language models (BERTology for Biology) to understand what biological features are being learned.

tools.name: ConPLex
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive protein language model for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method adapting protein language models and contrastive learning to predict drug-target interactions with high accuracy, enabling zero-shot prediction on novel targets.

tools.name: D-SCRIPT
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware deep learning for protein-protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: An interpretable deep learning model that predicts protein-protein interactions from sequences by learning structure-aware representations.

tools.name: protein_scoring
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for generating and scoring novel enzyme sequences
tools.detailed_description: A collection of models and metrics for generating and evaluating novel enzyme sequences, facilitating protein engineering tasks.

tools.name: graphvae_approx
tools.one_line_profile: Non-autoregressive Graph Variational Autoencoders for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: Efficient learning implementation of non-autoregressive Graph Variational Autoencoders (GraphVAE) designed for generating molecular graphs.

tools.name: ACANet
tools.one_line_profile: Activity-Cliff Awareness Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph learning framework incorporating activity-cliff awareness to improve the robustness and accuracy of molecular property predictions.

tools.name: GGNN_Meets_PLM
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of protein language models into geometric deep learning
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for integrating pre-trained protein language models with geometric graph neural networks to enhance protein representation learning.

tools.name: TAPE
tools.one_line_profile: Tasks Assessing Protein Embeddings benchmark suite
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating protein embeddings across five biologically relevant semi-supervised learning tasks.

tools.name: GCN-for-Structure-and-Function
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised embeddings for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) for generating unsupervised embeddings to predict protein functions.

tools.name: piston
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluating Protein Binding Interfaces with Transformer Networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool using transformer networks to evaluate and predict protein binding interfaces, aiding in the understanding of protein interactions.

tools.name: prose
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task and masked language model-based protein sequence embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating protein sequence embeddings using multi-task learning and masked language modeling techniques.

tools.name: protein-sequence-embedding-iclr2019
tools.one_line_profile: Structural information-aware protein sequence embeddings
tools.detailed_description: Source code and models for learning protein sequence embeddings that incorporate structural information, as presented at ICLR 2019.

tools.name: NetSolP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein solubility prediction using language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool that predicts the solubility and purification usability of proteins expressed in E. coli using protein language models.

tools.name: DeepPBS
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein-DNA binding specificity
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning model designed to predict protein-DNA binding specificity from structural data.

tools.name: ProtSpace
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for protein embedding spaces
tools.detailed_description: A program for visualizing and investigating the latent space of protein embeddings to understand model representations.

tools.name: Protein-Vec
tools.one_line_profile: Mixture of experts model for protein embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A protein embedding model utilizing a mixture of experts architecture to capture diverse protein features.

tools.name: wazy
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization with Pretrained Protein Sequence Models
tools.detailed_description: A framework for performing Bayesian optimization on protein sequences leveraging pretrained protein language models.

tools.name: TGSA
tools.one_line_profile: Twin Graph Neural Networks for Drug Response Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A protein-protein association-based twin graph neural network model for predicting drug responses, augmented with similarity information.

tools.name: holoprot
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Scale Representation Learning on Proteins
tools.detailed_description: A framework for multi-scale representation learning on proteins, integrating sequence, structure, and surface features.

tools.name: Graph2Graph
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Graph-to-Graph Translation for Molecular Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A model for learning multimodal graph-to-graph translation, applied to the task of molecular optimization.

tools.name: ProMEP
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot prediction of mutation effects on protein function
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal deep representation learning tool for zero-shot prediction of mutation effects on protein function.

tools.name: Evolla
tools.one_line_profile: ProteinChat: Generative model for decoding molecular language
tools.detailed_description: A frontier protein-language generative model (ProteinChat) designed to decode and interact with the molecular language of proteins.

tools.name: ProTrek
tools.one_line_profile: Trimodal Protein Language Model
tools.detailed_description: A trimodal protein language model designed to illuminate the protein universe by integrating sequence, structure, and function data.

tools.name: SaProt
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-aware Protein Language Model (AA+3Di)
tools.detailed_description: A protein language model that incorporates a structural alphabet (AA+3Di) to enhance protein representation and design capabilities.

tools.name: SaprotHub
tools.one_line_profile: Accessible interface for SaProt protein language modeling
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and interface designed to make the SaProt protein language model accessible to biologists for various downstream tasks.

tools.name: ProteinCLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for protein and natural language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing contrastive learning to harmonize protein language models with natural language models for cross-modal tasks.

tools.name: FeatureDock
tools.one_line_profile: Feature-based local environment learning for protein-ligand docking
tools.detailed_description: A protein-ligand docking software guided by physicochemical feature-based local environment learning using Transformer architectures.

tools.name: KG-MTL
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Enhanced Multi-Task Learning for Molecular Interaction
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing knowledge graphs to enhance multi-task learning for predicting molecular interactions, specifically designed to handle data sparsity and heterogeneity in biochemical networks.

tools.name: gLM
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic language model for protein co-regulation and function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A genomic language model trained on millions of metagenomic scaffolds to learn the latent syntax of protein functional organization, enabling prediction of protein function and co-regulation patterns.

tools.name: MFDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Antibody Sequence and Structure Co-design using AlphaFold3-like models
tools.detailed_description: A tool repurposing AlphaFold3-like protein folding models for the simultaneous design of antibody sequences and structures, facilitating de novo antibody discovery.

tools.name: Graph2GO
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based representation learning for protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A method leveraging graph neural networks to learn protein representations and predict Gene Ontology (GO) terms, integrating sequence and structural information.

tools.name: DeepGraphGO
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multispecies protein function prediction using GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network framework designed for high-throughput protein function prediction across multiple species, utilizing protein-protein interaction networks.

tools.name: MolCLR
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Contrastive Learning of Representations via GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A self-supervised learning framework for molecular representation learning using Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) and contrastive learning strategies, implemented in PyTorch Geometric.

tools.name: GLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive graph learning for molecular interactions and properties
tools.detailed_description: An adaptive graph learning method designed to automate the prediction of molecular interactions and physicochemical properties by optimizing graph structures.

tools.name: MGSSL
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning for molecules
tools.detailed_description: A self-supervised learning framework that leverages molecular motifs to generate high-quality graph representations for downstream molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: Molecular-graph-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A BERT-inspired architecture adapted for molecular graphs to perform semi-supervised learning for predicting various molecular properties.

tools.name: Meta-MGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A meta-learning framework combined with Graph Neural Networks designed to predict molecular properties in low-data (few-shot) scenarios.

tools.name: R-Predictor
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating plant disease resistance genes
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline integrating deep protein language models and machine learning classifiers to identify and annotate plant disease resistance (R) genes.

tools.name: IGN
tools.one_line_profile: InteractionGraphNet for Protein-Ligand Interaction Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep graph representation learning framework for accurately predicting protein-ligand interactions and binding affinities.

tools.name: InteractionGraphNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Graph Learning for Protein-Ligand Interaction and Virtual Screening
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for protein-ligand interaction prediction, optimized for large-scale structure-based virtual screening tasks.

tools.name: Mol-Instructions
tools.one_line_profile: Large-Scale Biomolecular Instruction Dataset for LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive instruction-tuning dataset designed to adapt Large Language Models (LLMs) for biomolecular tasks, including molecule generation and property prediction.

tools.name: OntoProtein
tools.one_line_profile: Protein Pretraining With Gene Ontology Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A pre-training framework that incorporates Gene Ontology (GO) knowledge into protein language models to enhance representation learning for downstream tasks.
